*/// react-router-dom components
import{Link}from"react-router-dom";// @mui material components
import Container from"@mui/material/Container";import Grid from"@mui/material/Grid";// Material Kit 2 React components
import MKBox from"components/MKBox";import MKBadge from"components/MKBadge";import MKTypography from"components/MKTypography";// Presentation page components
import ExampleCard from"pages/Presentation/components/ExampleCard";// Data
import data from"pages/Presentation/sections/data/designBlocksData";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function DesignBlocks(){const renderData=data.map(_ref=>{let{title,description,items}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{container:true,spacing:3,sx:{mb:10},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:12,lg:3,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MKBox,{position:"sticky",top:"100px",pb:{xs:2,lg:6},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MKTypography,{variant:"h3",fontWeight:"bold",mb:1,children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MKTypography,{variant:"body2",fontWeight:"regular",color:"secondary",mb:1,pr:2,children:description})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:12,lg:9,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{container:true,spacing:3,children:items.map(_ref2=>{let{image,name,count,route,pro}=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:12,md:4,sx:{mb:2},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:pro?"/":route,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExampleCard,{image:image,name:name,count:count,pro:pro})})},name);})})})]},title);});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MKBox,{component:"section",my:6,py:6,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{container:true,item:true,xs:12,lg:6,flexDirection:"column",alignItems:"center",sx:{textAlign:"center",my:6,mx:"auto",px:0.75},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MKBadge,{variant:"contained",color:"info",badgeContent:"Infinite combinations",container:true,sx:{mb:2}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MKTypography,{variant:"h2",fontWeight:"bold",children:"Huge collection of sections"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MKTypography,{variant:"body1",color:"text",children:"We have created multiple options for you to put together and customise into pixel perfect pages."})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{sx:{mt:6},children:renderData})]});}export default DesignBlocks;
